alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Converse County Lower Elevations; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Laramie Valley; Shirley Basin; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 31 at 5:40AM MST until January 31 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Converse County and the lower elevations of Carbon and Albany Counties. This includes the cities of Laramie, Rawlins, Douglas, and Saratoga. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Central Carbon County; Converse County Lower Elevations; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; Laramie Valley; Shirley Basin; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin
